price: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His way in firm ranks, as if they were a solid structure.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِهِۦ صَفّٗا كَأَنَّهُم بُنۡيَٰنٞ مَّرۡصُوصٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
